attributes.action: Abu Qatade must be deported for the safety of the united Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
We the people of the united kingdom, demand that the government elected by the people protect the people, by pulling out if the European Court of Human Rights.

Thereby being allowed to govern, our own country,
. By a system set down by the Magna Carta, a sysytem of common law, not civil law as the EU is enforcing on the united kingdom.
